text: I left my role at IHS Markit S&P Global in December 2024 to intentionally pivot into AI. In 2025, I completed a specialized AI program and immediately applied that knowledge by building real systems through freelance AI projects. This hands-on phase was crucial—it moved me from theory to production-style integration. By November 2025, I co-founded 12IQ, where I led the architecture and end-to-end development of a deterministic AI platform, delivering its MVP. That journey—structured learning, practical building, and entrepreneurial execution—defined my transition.
